text: Maile ta tiniharusita aru kehi pani bhaneko ho'ina tara tyo baheka junaki timile mala'i bhanna adesa garyau, yo ki timiharule allahako upasana gara, jo mero ra timro sabaiko palanakarta ho ra jabasam'ma ma tiniharuko bicama thi'em, tiniharuko avasthako saksi thi'em, pheri jaba timile mala'i utha'ihalyau taba timi nai tiniharuko sanraksaka bhayau ra timi pratyeka kurako jnata hau
